question: Maya is working on a text analysis project and needs to determine the length of any string input by the user. Write a program to take a string as input and print its length.

Meet Jancy, a diligent student learning to master programming. She is working on a project that requires her to process text data. Today, she needs to convert a given string to lowercase to ensure consistent and uniform text.
Chetan needs to analyze different strings to determine the count of vowels and check if vowels are present.

Sarah is organizing a letter-counting game for her friends. She has a string of letters and wants to identify the first letter that appears more than once. She needs the result to determine the winner of her game.
Robin is fascinated by ancient Roman numerals and wants to create a program to convert decimal numbers to Roman numerals. He needs your help to complete the program.
